篊字的基本解释

篊
hóng
引水。
成捆的竹木。
鱼梁，用竹篾编成的捕鱼器具。

篊字的汉语字典释义

[①]［hóng］
［《集韻》胡公切，平東，匣。］
竹制的捕鱼器具。

篊字的康熙字典解释

【未集上】【竹字部】　篊； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页892第24
【集韻】胡公切，音洪。【類篇】竹引水也。一曰竹木爲朿。　又【類篇】呼貢切。竹器，所以熯物者。　又【正字通】取魚具。【酉陽雜俎】晉時錢唐有人作篊，年取魚億計，號萬匠篊。【陸龜蒙詩】到頭江畔尋漁事，織竹中流萬尺篊。【楊愼集】篊从洪，石梁絕水曰洪，射洪、呂梁洪是也。洪加竹爲篊，蓋以竹爲魚梁也。

篊字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
篊字的起名意思

暂无。

篊
Basic explanation of words
篊
hóng
Diversion.
Bundles of bamboo wood.
Fish beams, fishing equipment made of bamboo strips.
篊
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［hóng］
["Ji Yun" Hu Gongqie, Pingdong, Xia. ]
Bamboo fishing equipment.
篊
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not set on] [Bamboo characters department] 　篊; Kangxi strokes: 15; Page number: page 892 24
[Jiyun] Hu Gongqie, Yinhong. 【Classes】Bamboo diversion. One said that bamboo and wood are 朿.　[Classes] Hu Gongqie. Bamboo ware, so seal objects.　[Zhengzitong] Take fishing gear. 【Youyang Miscellaneous】In the Jin Dynasty, there were people who made seals in Qiantang and Tang Dynasty. 【Lu Guimeng Poems】Go to the bank of the Toujiang River to search for fishing, weaving bamboos with ten thousand feet of bamboo. [The Collection of Yang Yun] Zhu Conghong, Shiliang had no water, called Hong, and Shehong and Lu Lianghong were also the same. Hongjiazhu is a sack, and the cover is a fish.
